title: Sample Meeting Minutes — January 2025
text: Agenda items included the budget review, fire district equipment, downtown parking study, and a grant application for the community center. Updates covered the water system upgrade, library expansion, volunteer program, zoning map, and river cleanup.

title: Sample Meeting Minutes — April 2024
text: Project updates covered Main Street streetscape, sidewalk repairs, broadband study, and a small business grant. Notes include park improvements, wildfire mitigation, emergency plan revisions, and cemetery records digitization.

title: Sample Meeting Minutes — October 2023
text: Approvals included Ordinance 2023-10, parks maintenance, and a community events permit. Discussion covered housing needs, annexation, trailhead signage, tourism outreach, and traffic safety on Pine Street.
